sent.orig: If you notice this notice you will notice that this notice is not worth noticing.
sent.trans: 若你看到这张告示，你会发现这张告示是不直得留意的。

sent.orig: So, embarrass person cannot beyond the mark, must notice safety notice safety!
sent.trans: 所以，捉弄人不能过分，一定要注意安全！

sent.orig: The notice of revocation shall reach the offeree before it has dispatched a notice of acceptance.
sent.trans: 撤销要约的通知应当在受要约人发出承诺通知之前到达受要约人。

sent.orig: Specific arrangements for the implementation of an additional notice of the price will soon notice.
sent.trans: 具体追加对价安排实施公告将于近日公告。

sent.orig: This notice may be cited as the Frontier Area (Permission to Enter) Notice.
sent.trans: 本公告可引称为《边境禁区（准许进入）公告》。
